issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Improve ergonomics of registering UDFs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8253](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8253). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Creating and registering UDFs currently requires quite a lot of boilerplate code and it would be good to improve this. See the comments on <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6749> for more details.

comments.body:

`[~jorgecarleitao]` I think this one can be closed now?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8253?focusedCommentId=17202906) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
I agree that we fixed this during ARROW-9836. I marked it as resolved and duplicated by that one. I hope it is fine.
